hideDefaultBorder.name: Hide Default Foundry Border
hideDefaultBorder.hint: Remove Foundry’s built-in selection border on tokens.

enableTarget.name: Enable Target Border
enableTarget.hint: Also show the outline and glow on tokens you target.

disableOutline.name: Disable Outline Filter
disableOutline.hint: Turn this on to completely disable the outline filter.

disableGlow.name: Disable Glow Filter
disableGlow.hint: Turn this on to completely disable the glow filter.

thickness.name: Outline Thickness
thickness.hint: Width of the outline in pixels.

glowDistance.name: Glow Distance
glowDistance.hint: Glow radius in pixels. Larger values expand the glow outward.

glowOuterStrength.name: Glow Strength
glowOuterStrength.hint: Intensity of the outer glow. Higher values are brighter.

mode.name: Color Mode
mode.hint: Use Foundry disposition colors, custom colors, or colors based on health condition.

colorMenu.name: Customize Colors
colorMenu.label: Customize Colors
colorMenu.hint: Open a color panel to set outline and glow colors for selected and targeted tokens.
colorMenu.reset: Pixie Border: Colors reset to defaults.
colorMenu.invalidHex: Please enter a valid hex color (e.g., #88ccff).

outlineColor.name: Outline Color
outlineColor.hint: Sets the outline color for selected tokens when Color Mode is set to custom.

targetOutlineColor.name: Target Outline Color
targetOutlineColor.hint: Sets the outline color for targeted tokens when target border is enabled.

glowColor.name: Glow Color
glowColor.hint: Sets the glow color for selected tokens when Color Mode is set to custom.

targetGlowColor.name: Target Glow Color
targetGlowColor.hint: Sets the glow color for targeted tokens when target border is enabled.

dispositionHostileColor.name: Hostile Color
dispositionHostileColor.hint: Used for hostile tokens when Color Mode is set to Disposition.

dispositionFriendlyColor.name: Friendly Color
dispositionFriendlyColor.hint: Used for friendly tokens when Color Mode is set to Disposition.

dispositionNeutralColor.name: Neutral Color
dispositionNeutralColor.hint: Used for neutral tokens when Color Mode is set to Disposition.

dispositionSecretColor.name: Secret Color
dispositionSecretColor.hint: Used for secret/hidden tokens when Color Mode is set to Disposition.

conditionHighColor.name: High HP Color
conditionHighColor.hint: Used when the token is at high health.

conditionMidColor.name: Mid HP Color
conditionMidColor.hint: Used when the token is at moderate health.

conditionLowColor.name: Low HP Color
conditionLowColor.hint: Used when the token is at low health.
